name: BAD GAME 2
description:
You are a frog, and you want cherries, because its good, so you will jump over spikes, evade a giant saw and fall into a falling platform! 

try to pass all the 14 levels to catch all the cherries, and die, and die, die, die, die, die, die, die, die. And of course this is one of my first projects on unity so its have many bugs.

Also the soundtrack was made by; xDeviruchi, all credits for him
